## IFlyout.setContainerVisible() method

Set whether this flyout's container is visible.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setContainerVisible(visible: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  visible | boolean | Whether the container is visible. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
